nodes.text: The skirmish aboard the Nanda's Luck took place when the pirates aboard the Majestic attacked the fishing vessel Nanda's Luck.

The crew of Nanda's Luck put up a ferocious fight even though they were outnumbered easily by three to one. The fight ended when Pyash Yopayomba, the leader of the pirates, joined the fray. A skilled fighter, she killed almost two dozen deckhands and defeated Sissalik in a duel that lasted ten seconds. After accepting the surrender of Captain Bipopa Bogzider, she killed him with her vibroblade and appointed Sissalik as the new captain of the Nanda's Luck.
